headline: BTIG Raises Price Target for AppLovin (APP), Keeps Buy Rating
summary: AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) is one of the 11 Best Revenue Growth Stocks to Buy Now. On August 7, BTIG increased its price target for AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) from $483 to $547 while keeping a Buy rating. This decision came after AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) reported Q2 2025 results, which were slightly better than BTIG’s expectations and […]
